data: [[380,[["EP1_BEAT_GAME",{"strName":"逃出 17 号城","strDescription":"与爱莉克斯逃出 17 号城市。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/380/ep1_beat_game.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":47.20000076293945}],["EP1_BEAT_HOSPITALATTICGUNSHIP",{"strName":"高手！","strDescription":"摧毁医院阁楼的武装直升机。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/380/ep1_beat_hospitalatticgunship.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":50}],["EP1_BEAT_CITIZENESCORT_NOCITIZENDEATHS",{"strName":"护送公民","strDescription":"护送公民到逃生火车，别让他们有生命危险。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/380/ep1_beat_citizenescort_nocitizendeaths.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":31.100000381469727}],["EP1_BEAT_GARAGEELEVATORSTANDOFF",{"strName":"电梯行动","strDescription":"活得足够长久才能搭上车库电梯。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/380/ep1_beat_garageelevatorstandoff.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":52.79999923706055}]]]]
